parts.title: Caring for Elderly People

parts.title: Volunteering Activities
parts.instruction: Questions 11-16: Choose SIX answers from the box A-I. Questions 17-20: Choose correct letter A, B or C.
parts.context: Information about volunteer roles and festival requirements

questions.text: What is the role of the volunteers in each of the following activities? Choose SIX answers from the box and write the correct letter, A-I, next to Questions 11-16.
activities: 15. participating at lunches for retired people

options.B: providing publicity about a council service
options.G: introducing guest speakers at an event

questions.text: Which event requires the largest number of volunteers?
What is the most important requirement for volunteers at the festivals?
New volunteers will start working in the week beginning
What is the next annual event for volunteers?

parts.title: Human Geography Opinions
parts.instruction: Questions 21-25: Choose FIVE answers from the box A-G. Questions 26-30: Choose correct letter A, B or C.
parts.context: Rosie and Colin's opinions about different aspects of human geography

questions.text: What is Rosie and Colin's opinion about each of the following aspects of human geography? Choose FIVE answers from the box and write the correct letter, A-G, next to Questions 21-25.

options.A: The information given about this was too vague.
options.B: This may not be relevant to their course.
options.C: This will involve only a small number of statistics.
options.D: It will be easy to find facts about this.
options.E: The facts about this may not be reliable.
options.F: No useful research has been done on this.
options.G: The information provided about this was interesting.

questions.text: Rosie says that in her own city the main problem is

options.B: why there was opposition to it
options.C: how much of it has actually been built
